title: Razer Cortex,
body:
Hello,

I wondered if anyone could help me with a program named Razer Cortex, it is a program that boosts games and can record them also,
But they only support recording at 32-bit games, though I see people recording league with this program while I can't,

So my question is:
Is league a 32- or 64-bit game and since I am running it in 64-bit is it possible to run it in a 32-bit way?

Example (as u can see many people ask it in the comments also):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tbwCZlgoBTY

replies.body: League of Legends ist derzeit mit allen Prozessen ein 32bit Programm.
Thank you, then I am not sure why it is having problems recording, I'll try and figure it out.
